releases.title: ETISS Perf (main, ETISS v0.11.2)
commands: mkdir -p $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04 && ./build-riscv-tools.sh --compress --force --setup etiss_perf --docker ubuntu:20.04 --dest $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04 ETISS_REF=v0.11.2 ETISS_PERF_REF=main && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04/etiss_perf.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04.tar.xz && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04/etiss_perf_src.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-src.tar.xz

mkdir -p $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04 && ./build-riscv-tools.sh --compress --force --setup etiss_perf --docker ubuntu:22.04 --dest $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04 ETISS_REF=v0.11.2 ETISS_PERF_REF=main && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04/etiss_perf.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04.tar.xz && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04/etiss_perf_src.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-src.tar.xz

mkdir -p $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04 && ./build-riscv-tools.sh --compress --force --setup etiss_perf --docker ubuntu:24.04 --dest $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04 ETISS_REF=v0.11.2 ETISS_PERF_REF=main && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04/etiss_perf.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04.tar.xz && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04/etiss_perf_src.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/etiss_perf_main_etiss_v0.11.2//etiss-perf-src.tar.xz
